General.Name: INKON Life Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: INKON Life Technology Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells edible mushrooms in China and internationally. The company's products include fresh brown shimeji, white shimeji, needle, and king oyster mushrooms. It also engages in the development, production, sale, and maintenance of gamma ray stereotactic radiotherapy treatment system; construction and operation of radiation oncology treatment centers; and investments business. The company was formerly known as Starmap Medicine and Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to INKON Life Technology Co., Ltd. in July 2019. INKON Life Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Dongguan, China.
